2108220.name: KANZO Demo
2108220.description:
KANZO is a fast-paced Hack and Slash game packed with stylish melee combat, the game is set in Sci-Fi Cyberpunk world which is destroyed and now being controlled by a group of organization MAVERICK.

There is no survival left. KANZO an ex MAVERICK who left the organization cause of some reason is again hired by the rulers of the city to clean up. KANZO is equipped with a katana and variety of other weapons and skills to deal with foes.

The environments are full of violence's and variety of enemies blocking your way for the last revenge. But as you are a samurai deal with them your own way, or just be KANZO. The story take a massive twist in the end so wait for that,

This demo is to get an overview how the gameplay will be and will help in polishing the game more.
2108220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
